items.title: digital domi
items.longDescription: leading qa at digital domi - figuring out features, fixing bugs, and everything in between

projects.title: domi app
bullets: Led end-to-end manual and automated QA across mobile apps, consumer web, business platforms, and support dashboards, ensuring stable and high-quality releases
Designed and executed test cases, regression cycles, and API validations while managing bugs, release notes, and changelogs to prevent production issues
Collaborated with cross functional teams to manage release notes, validate requirements, and ensure smooth, mishap free production releases

items.title: wander

bullets: Built a conversational chatbot for a Bangalore startup to automate interview scheduling
Developed phased guidance for form-filling and document submission using LLMs and backend APIs
Enabled personalized user responses by integrating application status and requirements into the chatbot
Automated repetitive tasks with SeleniumBase and PatchRight to streamline workflows
Collaborated with startup teams to design intuitive, user-friendly automation solutions

items.title: mentiff
